cards.title: Safety First
cards.text: Always follow safety principles in the mountains and during hikes. Don't take risks without the necessary equipment and knowledge.

cards.title: Considering Weather Conditions
cards.text: Check the weather forecast before departure and prepare for any weather conditions. Choose appropriate clothing and equipment accordingly.

cards.title: Route Analysis
cards.text: Choose a route that matches your level of preparation. Always follow safety principles in the mountains and during hikes. Don't take risks without the necessary equipment and knowledge.
